original: 已遣人對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>樹上開花計謀遭遇了意料之外的問題，不慎失敗了！(<color=#bceea7>樹上開花 失敗</color>)
text: Someone has been sent to encounter unexpected problems with the flowering strategy on the <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> tree, and accidentally failed! (<color=#bceea7>Flowering on the tree failed</color>)
